name: travel-app
description: Travel App - Full Stack Application with React Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.predeploy: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cp -r dist ../backend_mongo/frontend-dist
scripts.deploy: cd backend_mongo && npm install && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend_mongo && npm run dev"
